title: The Triangle E6 - Dark Demonstration
description:
With every discovery, the team somehow becomes more and more trapped on this island that doesn’t exist. 

Episode written by Sylvia Spruck Wrigley.

For more shows like this, visit Realm.fm, and sign up for our newsletter while you're there!

Adrenaline: The Triangle is a Realm production. Listen away.
